questions.title: Would you sail or swim?
questions.author: Ingram
questions.answer: If its in the ocean i would love to sail

questions.title: Who is your favourite musician
questions.author: Riche
questions.answer: Have many favourite but for now i would go with Pyotr Ilyich Tchaikovsky, yeah that's right you don't know him.

questions.answer: Am Guessing this is not a serious question and i decline to answer

questions.answer: Piece by Piece my friend, piece by piece

answers.content: Create a big hoax around it
